Thanks for using G1 Test Genius!
This is a major update that requires full progress reset, so your test history will be lost when you upgrade.
In this v5.0 release we're excited to introduce G1 Test Premium - an in-app purchase that removes all ads so that you can study without distractions. Premium also unlocks access to several new tests and a number of cool new features. Here's a full list of changes:

What's New

• New app icon
• Updated question database
• New menu design across the app
• Night Mode (Premium feature)
• Remove all ads (Premium feature)
• Unlock access to more tests with questions that are likely to appear on your G1 test (Premium feature)
• Reset all results (Premium feature)
• Add to Challenge Bank™ (Premium feature)
- performance improvements

- more practice tests
- updated question database
- improved question skipping
- improved animations

• updated question database
• bug fixes and performance improvements
This release contains minor fixes and improvements.
This release contains minor fixes and improvements.

- Introducing Pass Probability. Now you can see how you'd score on the official G1 exam if you took it today! The Pass Probability algorithm performs complex calculations in real time based on your activity. It combines these with various heuristics to estimate your odds of passing and makes smart suggestions on what you need to do to be fully prepared.
- Question bank update

- Redesigned from the ground up
- Larger font size for question and answer options

- Explanations now appear below the correct answers.
